**Before submitting a pull request,** please make sure the following is done:

- Fork [the repository](https://github.com/anthonyjoeseph/spectacles-ts) and create your branch from `main`.
- Run `yarn install` in the repository root.
- If you've fixed a bug or added code that should be tested, add tests!
- Ensure the test suite passes (`yarn test`).

**Note**. If you've fixed a bug please link the related issue or, if missing, open an issue before sending a PR.
